name: European Network for Social Innovation and Solidarity
goal:
Towards a social Europe…

The European Network for Social Innovation and Solidarity (ENSIS) brings together local, regional, national and Europe-wide organisations within the social sector (whether professionally-staffed or based on volunteers) as well as not for profit initiatives, committed to a collective solidarity and wishing to develop a social Europe through programmes of social innovation.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Culture, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: Strategy 2020, Horizon 2020 and all other European project related to social cohesion.
